title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally with a single CLI or REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull and manage models in a few lines.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama endpoints for chat, completion, embeddings and tool-calling.

title: llama-index-integrations/llms/ollama
summary: LlamaIndex LLM and embedding drivers for Ollama; plug local models into RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (now renamed “Open WebUI”); supports RAG, multimodal, admin panel.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API; Android compatible.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI that wraps the Ollama REST API with fuzzy model search and progress bars.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement with inline suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat app bootstrapped with Vite; demonstrates streaming chat via ollama-js.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Simple retrieval-augmented generation example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings any Ollama model into servers with slash commands and threads.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines for LLM-powered tests.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim client library for Ollama with native async/await and compile-time model type safety.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C# SDK targeting .NET 6+ with IAsyncEnumerable streaming support.

title: ollama-ex
summary: Elixir wrapper that exposes Ollama as GenServer processes for fault-tolerant chat in Phoenix apps.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Zig client for Ollama with cross-compilation support and bundled static binary releases.

title: ollama-ansible
summary: Ansible role to install Ollama, pull models, and configure systemd on Ubuntu/Debian hosts.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform module to provision GPU-enabled AWS EC2 instances with Ollama pre-installed and model cache on EFS.
